td.content: shows esophagitis with a massive gastric ulcer extending from the inscura to the pylorus, no active bleeding was noted at the site

td.content: s:pt describes moderate weight loss over several months, moderate vomiting, moderate nausea and Cancer. she is a 21 yo white female. she denies smoking Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol o:Height 61 in, Weight 96 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 1000 mg/m2 IV, cisplatin - 100 mg/m2 IV, and ordered EGD.

s:patient presents without specific complaints. pt denies vomiting, nausea and weight loss over several months. pt is a 21 year old female student. o:Height 62 in, Weight 98 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 90, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16, EGD shows esophagitis with a massive gastric ulcer extending from the inscura to the pylorus, no active bleeding was noted at the site a:Stomach Cancer p:performed EGD, and performed E/M Level 1 (new patient) - Completed.

s:a white female student aged 21 ys presents with 3 years history of moderate dyspepsia, moderate abdominal pain. pt reports moderate epigastric pain. she denies drinking alcohol she does not smoke o:Height 62 in, Weight 100 lbs, Temperature 99.2 F, Pulse 90, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, no rebound tenderness, HEENT: WNL, all lung fields a:Ulcers p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.

td.content: s:white f aged 22 years presents with 8 months history of moderate vomiting, moderate weight loss over several months. pt reports moderate nausea. o:Height 61 in, Weight 96 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 1000 mg/m2 IV, cisplatin - 100 mg/m2 IV, and ordered Upper Endoscopy, CBC, Comprehensive Metabolic Panel, CEA.
